<style>.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-0 { color: #212121; background: #FCFCFC url('images/0fbbb.jpg') no-repeat scroll; padding: 0px;  }
.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-1 { color: #292929; background: #F0F0F0;  }
.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-2 { color: #292929; padding-right: 10px;padding-left: 10px;  }
.art-content .art-postcontent-0 .layout-item-3 { padding: 20px;  }
.ie7 .art-post .art-layout-cell {border:none !important; padding:0 !important; }
.ie6 .art-post .art-layout-cell {border:none !important; padding:0 !important; }

</style>
